website_summaries.verdict: A gentle scrub that exfoliates with enzymes, and seals in moisture using nourishing colloidal oatmeal.
pros: Uses salicylic acid, ginko and colloidal oatmeal
Brightens, clears pores, creates an even, smooth skin tone
Vegan, cruelty-free, and free from parabens, formaldehydes, and more
cons: The scent could be more appealing

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be a knock off
customer_reviews.text: In the spa the boxes of this product have seams like the small bottle in my photo. The large box on the right of it is the one I purchased from this seller. Bar code looks fake as it has larger clear looking tape over the seal and numbers appear to have been intentionally scratched off. Other reviews are concerning as well in regard to the authenticity.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Real or Fake this stuff is Amazeballs!
customer_reviews.text: I was leery to order this after reading the reviews but after using it for 3 months my skin is glowing and freaking gorgeous! I went to work without foundation and only a little mascara and chapstick and everyone thought I had a full face on! Trust me my coworkers are some shady heifers and would have told me if I looked tired or crazy, but nothing compliments all day! I am truly a believer and I'm hooked!
customer_reviews.author: stilt

customer_reviews.title: Not Authentic packaging
customer_reviews.text: Package came damaged. Compared to same item at Saphora and my dermatologist this packaging does not look authentic which leaves me to believe the product is not authentic. There is no manufacturer seal around packaging.
customer_reviews.author: JimF

customer_reviews.title: Less expensive in the long run.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is expensive but then you realize you use very little each time. You aren’t paying for water or filler, just the powder. Since I’ve started using it, I’ve had less oil on my face due to my pores actually being clean. My pores are shrinking! The redness of my face has reduced and my overall complexion has improved. I had faster results from 1 bottle this, then 6 micro dermabrasion treatments.
customer_reviews.author: KittyB

customer_reviews.title: This product seems fine but it was not sealed
customer_reviews.text: I've been using dermalogica for 15 years, big fan. Usually get it from official dealers. This product seems fine but it was not sealed. I had never seen it being sold unsealed. It doesn't look like it was tempered with but I'm not too happy that it was unsealed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Results
customer_reviews.text: As an esthetician I’ve tried soooo many different exfoliants I can’t even keep count. For those of use who love to daily exfoliate but do not want to strip, aggravate or overdue it, this is my favorite. I have classic combination skin with the occasional hormonal break out. This brightens, tightens, smooths and evens out my skin tone. I even use it as a backside scrub and it leaves it as smooth as a 🍑.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Welkom

customer_reviews.title: Most effective and best value
customer_reviews.text: I've now used Dermalogica for 10 years and I wish I had started sooner. It is gentle, yet effective, for my combination skin. It is so important to exfoliate every day but I have sensitive skin so this is the best product for me. The price turned me off at first but it lasts a long time. If I go two or three days without using it, my skin starts to feel rough. My favorite product of all time!
customer_reviews.author: A. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Best daily scrub
customer_reviews.text: This is a staple in my skin care routine for years now. I'm a big fan of double cleansing and I use this as the 1st step in my routine at night. I put it on my clarisonic sometimes but alone feels just as effective. I follow up with a gentle cleanser and finish with my other products. For a couple of years I was using biore baking soda powder face scrub (the actual powder form) it was better for break outs but is impossible to find now so i went back to this and other than the price difference it's been the best replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Liv B.

customer_reviews.title: Softer than a baby's bottom ...
customer_reviews.text: That's my 72 yo face after using this on a regular basis. It's more than grit, but it is that. Excellent, gentle exfoliator. I also have rosacea, so I worry about too much manipulation causing breakouts, but this works just fine. I mix it with my liquid cleanser. Yes, it is pricey, but it lasts FOREVER.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Reader

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the real deal!
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample from Dermatologica when I bought my staple face cream through their website. I can tell you, after purchasing the full product through Amazon, that it is exactly what I got. Anybody who has ever done this product will know the feeling. I usually buy my beauty products through Ulta, because I don’t trust an ‘outside source’. But Amazon really did deliver on this one...
customer_reviews.author: jengu1

customer_reviews.title: For baby soft skin
customer_reviews.text: This product is a little on the pricy side, but it works well and a single bottle lasts me about a year. I use it once or twice a week, and it leaves my face smooth and soft. Most exfoliating products like this use large granules that leave my skin red. The granules in this product are smaller than sand, more like dust. I add a small amount to my liquid cleanser and it buffs the wrinkles and dead skin right away. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome daily chemical exfoliator
customer_reviews.text: I actually only use this every other day because on alternate days, I use chemical exfoliating serums. Regardless, this is very gentle and effective. It is a powder that you mix with water into a paste and massage over skin. I especially like to use this when i break out because it helps to treat acne without irritating it.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: LIke it a lot
customer_reviews.text: This feels good on my mature, sensitive skin, and does a nice job cleansing. I leave it on my face a few minutes to let the salicylic acid do its thing. Not sure why this is so expensive, but I do like it. Whether I buy it again will depend on how long one bottle lasts.
customer_reviews.author: ellis

customer_reviews.title: Best micro exfoliant I've tried
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for a very long time and I can't imagine anything better. It's such a fine exfoliant so it's gentle and not too abrasive but it's just enough to exfoliate effectively and slough the dead skin away. I highly recommend it for all skin types. It can be used daily but I only use mine about twice a week and it still makes a difference!
customer_reviews.author: Katie W.

customer_reviews.title: My favourite exfoliator!
customer_reviews.text: This is my all time favourite holy grail exfoliator! I bought it when it was on sale and I love it! Super gentle, even as a daily exfoliator. Smells like of like the the cloudy water you get after washing rice. Makes my skin feel brand new every time I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: It's a powder!
customer_reviews.text: It may work... but I like my scrub is a base... this is a powder. It spills, it does not last long. There are other products as good for similar cost that are easier to use. I have sensitive skin... this did not bother it... but with so many great products out there I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: nanalisa

customer_reviews.title: Is it authentic?
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this microfiliant almost for 5 years and I love it. As far as I know, there should be a holographic safety seal sealing the top of the box. The one I got does not have it. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Tham

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample of this in an ulta bag. I’m not one to buy expensive stuff, but after trying it I had to order the full size! I have sensitive dry skin and this stuff is a life saver, especially in winter. My skin feels so soft after using it!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product I’ve used for years. Leaves skin, probably of any type (mine is combination) feeling soft, refreshed and deep cleansed following use of regular cleanser. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S

customer_reviews.title: Using this for 15 years and counting!
customer_reviews.text: This is my holy grail product. If I had to chose one beauty product, it would be this one. It's so gentle and leaves your face feeling smooth. It even shrinks your pores. Just buy it. You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My skin was noticeably smoother in a week, and now it’s a must! I normally don’t spend a lot on skin care, and $40 is a lot for me, but I’m hooked and can’t go back. It took away my redness and left my skin so soft!
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Very very very gentle
customer_reviews.text: It’s very very very gentle , maybe to gentle but that’s how I like it. Not that great if you are trying to tackle pores but it is great for people looking to remove a very superficial top layer of skin. I leave the formula on for about 5 minutes until it dries out a little and it leaves my skin really smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Super clean!
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to use. Just add some water , then massage my face. Feeling super clean after using it during my shower. Also feel my skin is getting brightening !
customer_reviews.author: Danny N

customer_reviews.title: Daily secret weapon for bright skin
customer_reviews.text: My secret weapon against age spots and dull skin. I’ve used this product for years and it still feels clean and fresh every day.
customer_reviews.author: Essem

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money. Great results.
customer_reviews.text: My friend recently became an aesthetician and wanted me to try this brand. Reluctant to spend the money on an entire line, i started on my own with this product and i have to say I’m happy i did. This exfoliates gently but beautifully. Far better than the specialized exfoliating brushes I’ve used for years. I am so very happy with the results. I saw a difference after the first use. I’ve been using it daily for 2 weeks now and have achieved results i didn’t think possible for my skin. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with seal broken on box
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with sticker seal already broken on the box, no seal linking cap to bottle, & what appear to be very faint fingerprint marks on cap, leading me to believe it someone had opened it previously. Returning for a (hopefully sealed this time) replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy G Osborne

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Product. Cleanses my face without over abrasion. Leaves my face very smooth
customer_reviews.author: Short one

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in this. The product works well, I just don’t think it does anything for my skin. However it last a very long time
customer_reviews.author: GinB

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this for about 60 days now. I look forward to cleaning my face in the morning because I know how soft and silky it will feel. My pores have significantly reduced in size. I have been using this in combination with the derma clay cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very gentle.  Non sb
customer_reviews.text: Kind of expensive but long-lasting. I don’t use it daily, My face feels so soft and smooth with this rice enzyme product
customer_reviews.author: M king

customer_reviews.title: Good for daily use as not overly abrasive.
customer_reviews.text: Very silky and slightly abraiding cleanser. Immediately soaps up and goes on smoothly. The little abraiding bits disappear quite quickly but that's probably good for daily use. Nice product and plenty of it.
customer_reviews.author: Mm

customer_reviews.title: Good for body
customer_reviews.text: I do not use this on my face. I have fairly sensitive skin and this works great on the occasional blemishes that pop up on the decolletage/upper back.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Barber

customer_reviews.title: Glowing skin
customer_reviews.text: My skin always feels so soft after I use this! It's gentle enough to use every day too.
customer_reviews.author: J_E_27

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a knock off or a previous formula. The original has a different feel and is not as gritty while also a slightly different color if you look at it closely.
customer_reviews.author: RedShoes

customer_reviews.title: Is this genuine dermalogica or just old product?
customer_reviews.text: Questioning whether this is genuine dermalogica or perhaps it’s really old product. It’s much “grainier” than usual and quite rough on the skin. I’ve been using this product for years and was disappointed with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Have to mix power with wet hands
customer_reviews.text: I don’t really love that you mix the power with your wet hands But it does seam to be light enough to use daily
customer_reviews.author: anapaula

customer_reviews.title: Best exfoliator for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I’m allergic to most facial products, but this one is gentle and still does the job of removing dead cells.
customer_reviews.author: Birdstomper

customer_reviews.title: It’s a powder.
customer_reviews.text: I order this product by mistake, I didn’t realize that it was powder so I’d have to mix with water each time I use it. I find this less convenient but it’s still a good product and I’m thinking it may be good to have in a travel toiletry kit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product but expensive
customer_reviews.text: Love the scrub. Skin feels super smooth after. Expensive and may not buy again due to cost
customer_reviews.author: Kerri W.

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Good product.. loves the way my face feels after using it. Price is way out of control!
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Boivin

customer_reviews.title: Best exfoliant I've used
customer_reviews.text: Best exfoliant I've used. I love that it can be used daily. You only need to use a tiny bit, so I know this container will last me a LONG time. Well worth the price. Very gentle, especially for older skin.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great powder based cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: I got a facial one day, and the lady recommended this product to me. I love it! Something about it being a powder and making it myself basically in my hand. Nice exfoliant, and my face feels so clean after wards. When my bottle is done, I will buy another definitely.
customer_reviews.author: Antonia V

customer_reviews.title: good exfoliating powder
customer_reviews.text: Good product to exfoliate your skin on a daily basis. Good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever
customer_reviews.text: We love this face wash. We don’t use all the time but very effective when needed
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Lacks Enough Micro Beads
customer_reviews.text: It's just okay. Not enough micro beads to exfoliate my oily skin as I would like. I was expecting a lot from this product considering the price. I'll use it up, but I won't be buying anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best face exfoliant on the market today!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this microfoliant for 10 years it to me is the best in the market... it cleans and unclogs your pores and leaves your skin soft and bright..
customer_reviews.author: Slim

customer_reviews.title: Size and quantity issue
customer_reviews.text: Quantity is less within bottle as well main box seal was open,may be seller have to take care on this
customer_reviews.author: CmR

customer_reviews.title: Best of its kind!
customer_reviews.text: This has been my favorite skin care product for years. Its pricier than similar products but much more effective than others I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Jacque

customer_reviews.title: Product that works!
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and have found a lot of microfoliants dry my skin out and really don’t work. I tried the trial size of this first and it was AMAZING! I loved the results of my skin and it’s just wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Great exfoliate
customer_reviews.text: Mild enough to use daily Does not leave the skin dry
customer_reviews.author: Amazon junkie

customer_reviews.title: Will re-purchase this over and over again!
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with this rice grain face exfoliant . It makes my face so smooth and clear of all the debris.
customer_reviews.author: Vivi

customer_reviews.title: Knockoff!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. But I should have never ordered it from here. It’s a knockoff. !!! SAVE YOUR MONEY!!! I think they mixed it with a little bit of the product and the rest flour. It smells exactly like flour and feels like it to. I totally regret buying this from here. Next time I’m going to just go to the store and get it.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great exfoliater for face
customer_reviews.text: Great product for exfoliating! Leaves your skin baby soft. Excellent
customer_reviews.author: jj88

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $
customer_reviews.text: I love all their products <3 I have overly sensitive skin so I do not have many options when it comes to products. My esthetician recommended these products and I will never turn back. Daily I use the clay cleanser, microfoliant and active moist.
customer_reviews.author: LindzGreg

customer_reviews.title: Exfoliates very well
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I use it every day, and I am an older woman. It does not dry my skin out, I use my moisturizer after. And my skin is so clear and glowing
customer_reviews.author: Janet L. Ridgeway

customer_reviews.title: I have been using Daily Microfoliant by Dermologica for years ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Daily Microfoliant by Dermologica for years. I have large pores, especially in my T-zone and this is the only product I've founqqd that helps control blackhead, oil, and clogged pores.
customer_reviews.author: Jewelry lover

customer_reviews.title: Good job, does the trick
customer_reviews.text: Product does what is expected. But you have to use more than they advise to make it effective. But still there is enough product for many uses.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Durden

customer_reviews.title: Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: I used Prime to order, so it didn't arrive in two days because of the holiday, but I received it in about 4. The product I've used for the past four nights and it appears to be of the same quality of what I've used before. No real issues. I hope they keep the price as is because I plan to order this again.
customer_reviews.author: BizyBee

customer_reviews.title: Dermalogica is the best skincare
customer_reviews.text: I only use dermalogica products and this is my favorite. I’m never without this keeps the skin bright and pores small.
customer_reviews.author: Jerseyg888

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer seal broken, item found out of original box. Unable to use product with confidence.
customer_reviews.text: Shipping issue: This product arrived today along with another item. Both products were found loose in box. This item was out of original box. Most concerning issue is that the manufacturer seal is broken. I can not now use this product with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Nastasia

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Great everyday gentle exfoliator, simpler to the tatcha rice power just slightly cheaper! Will def be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: The best quality cleanser/ exfoliator around! Worth every penny. This also has greatly reduced my acne. Amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Ford C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Helps get rid of the dry skin by my nose
customer_reviews.author: Angela McMillon

customer_reviews.title: Great for combination skin
customer_reviews.text: I love how gentle this exfoliant is. It does its job of smoothing out my skin without causing irritation or dryness.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Mims

customer_reviews.title: In love!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff makes my face glow and look vibrant. Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jose W.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely skin
customer_reviews.text: I love Dermalogica. I have been using this particular product for more than 20 years and it always makes my skin feel "polished" and clean.
customer_reviews.author: kitty

customer_reviews.title: Awesome microwxfolient
customer_reviews.text: This is the best microexfolient ever! Leaves my skin so smoothe.
customer_reviews.author: Robin b

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: She loves this product line - was a perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Foster

customer_reviews.title: Dermalogica is my go to
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of dermalogica, as it is my go to skin care.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Y.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Skin
customer_reviews.text: This product feels so good on my skin! Its gentle, easy to use and store, and makes my skin super soft. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cleaning powder for your face I have been using it for over ten years!!!
customer_reviews.author: hanna

customer_reviews.title: My go to!
customer_reviews.text: This microfoliant is my go to EVERY time!! I’ve tried so many as a licensed Aesthetician but this one does the job and gives results desired.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I love this rice-based cleanser. It leaves my skin feeling softer and more clean than a traditional soap. It has also improved the texture of my skin within a short period of time (I switched to it two weeks ago and have already noticed a visible difference). This seller ships quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Powers

customer_reviews.title: Skin so soft
customer_reviews.text: Oh man I love this stuff! Keeps me from breakouts. I need to exfoliate every day. actually I use it twice a day , that's how gentle it is, and my face looks amazing and feels great. Love love love!
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore this product. I have been using it for several years, and strongly recommend it. I have sensitive skin, and this does not ever irritate it, nor does it leave my skin feeling scratchy or dry.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Use this whole line of you have sensitive red skin
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely sensitive skin that breaks out if you just wink at me wrong lol, I use this product everyday and it helps so much
customer_reviews.author: Heather Powell

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It give the initial roughness of a scrub but then dissolves on your skin so it isn’t harsh
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent for cleansing and exfoliating skin on the face. I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Clean
customer_reviews.text: This product leaves your face squeaky clean without stripping your face dry. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken seal
customer_reviews.text: This product came with the seal already broken and the lid was all over with product spilled. Returning. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gollaher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it and I've used it for years (twice a week). It's mild but does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: LL00

customer_reviews.title: Great daily exfoliant
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for years. Love it. Delivered fast
customer_reviews.author: Liz170

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I just got it today and used it for the first time. I can tell how amazing it is. My skin is soft and shiny. I'm impressed that how it works immediately.
customer_reviews.author: fifi

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My skin really feels clean, even soft after using it. It it not harsh, will continue using it!
customer_reviews.author: Ivona O

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: It irritated my skin. Unfortunately I didn't catch the return window. So now I'm stuck with an expensive product, that I'm unable to use.
customer_reviews.author: VFJ

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Worth the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and great for all skin types. Definitely worth the money as it will last at the very least 6 months. Gentle tiny grains that you can you use everyday. Definitely helps slough off old/dead skin cells. I’m very pleased with purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: carly castille

customer_reviews.title: the product is excellent and use it for years, however the seller does not seem to be honest
customer_reviews.text: as many other buyers stated, the original packaging of the product was cut through and hence no original sealing.
customer_reviews.author: Eyfy

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Leaves my skin feeling soft and smooth. Bottle lasts for months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes my skin super soft
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. It makes my skin super soft and isn't overly drying. Plus it's not a liquid so great for travel!
customer_reviews.author: Kiley A Dozier Bosanko

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I use this every morning and it keeps my skin looking bright and smooth. Can't do without this product.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and soft skin
customer_reviews.text: It’s worth every penny. Leaves my skin so soft and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Skin got shinier instantly. Face wash, toner than this
customer_reviews.author: Vi

customer_reviews.title: This does not feel like a typical exfoliator
customer_reviews.text: This does not feel like a typical exfoliator. Much softer on the face but still scrubs away the dead skin. I would repurchase even though I felt it was a little expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps my complex
customer_reviews.text: I like how fast the product came love the product have used it for many years
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a must have for me. Works great and really makes my skin look nicer. I use it every morning. Also this little bottle goes a long way- lasts me at least 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Cario26

customer_reviews.title: I like it, but on strong side for my sensitive ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but on strong side for my sensitive skin. Will probably use only once per week, not what the directions said.
customer_reviews.author: Lmarie

customer_reviews.title: Best microfoliant ever
customer_reviews.text: Best microfoliant ever. Takes my blackheads away and makes my skin smooth with one wash. Although I don't do it daily because it will irritate my sensitive skin. I don't know what I would do without it.
customer_reviews.author: Idania

customer_reviews.title: and I am very pleased with the results since I started using this product
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, and I am very pleased with the results since I started using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry from Illinois

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It makes my face feel so clean and it glows. It's worth every penny. I use it 3 times a week with along with my daily cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Lora marra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I use it regularly and my skin feels smooth and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: CathG
